# 地图生命周期

# 地图的创建


<template>
  <el-gmap class="g-map" />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
.g-map {
  height: 300px;
}
</style>

# 地图的销毁


<template>
  <div class="destroy__container">
    <el-gmap class="g-map" v-if="!isDestroy" />
    <button
      type="button"
      :class="`destroy__button el-button el-button--${isDestroy ? 'default' : 'danger'}`"
      @click="_ => this.isDestroy = !this.isDestroy"
    >
      {{ isDestroy ? '创建' : '销毁'}}
    </button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        isDestroy: false
      }
    },
    methods: {
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
.destroy {
  &__container {
    height: 300px;
    background-color: antiquewhite;
    position: relative;
  }
  &__button {
    position: absolute;
    right: 10px;
    bottom: 10px;
    z-index: 2;
  }
}
</style>

TIP

对于 el-gmap 组件在其被自身被销毁之前，会自动卸载地图

# 地图加载完成


<template>
  <div class="complete__container">
    <el-gmap class="g-map" :events="events" v-if="isStart" />
    <button
      v-if="!isStart"
      type="button"
      class="complete__button el-button el-button--default"
      @click="_ => this.isStart = true"
    >
      开始创建地图
    </button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        isStart: false,
        events: {
          complete: this.completeFun
        }
      }
    },
    methods: {
      completeFun() {
        alert('地图加载完成哦！')
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
  .complete {
    &__container {
      height: 300px;
      background-color: antiquewhite;
      position: relative;
    }
    &__button {
      position: absolute;
      right: 10px;
      top: 10px;
      z-index: 2;
    }
  }
</style>
